lead_paragraph: Speaking from Russia to a session of the Athens Democracy Forum, the whistle-blower said he would maintain his focus on U.S. surveillance policies.

headline.print_headline: Snowden Says Disclosures Bolstered Individual Privacy
headline.main: Edward Snowden Says Disclosures Bolstered Individual Privacy

snippet: Speaking from Russia to a session of the Athens Democracy Forum, the whistle-blower said he would maintain his focus on U.S. surveillance policies....
abstract: Edward J Snowden, expressing his gratitude for campaign being led on his behalf for presidential pardon, says his disclosures bolstered privacy for individual citizens in United States; Obama administration has rejected idea in earlier petition campaigns, saying Snowden should face espionage trial in United States.
